p.d: 20 year-old Kevin is bored living with his parents in the country and works half-heartedly on a farm. When he meets Alice, an acrobat in an equestrian circus, it's love at first sight. To win her heart he takes a crazy decision: to learn equestrian vaulting all on his own... Directed by: Alain Tasma (France, 2018) Screenplay: Pierre Grillet, Alain Tasma Cast: Benjamin Voisin (Kevin), Margot Bancilhon (Alice), AloIse Sauvage (Julius), Olivier Loustau (Jean), Julien Triguer (Mel), Éric Paul (Kevin's father), Aurélie Vérillon (Kevin's mother), Liv Henneguier (Mariam) Genre: drama Awards: ADAMI prize for the best male newcomer (Benjamin Voisin), Nouvelle-Aquitaine "Sud-Ouest" readers' prize, 2018 La Rochelle Festival de la Fiction TV
